    • postBake

      protected void postBake(List<net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.ClickableWidget> widgets)
      Description copied from class: LayoutGroup
      Ran after this layout group is baked. Use this for one-time initialization, such as the height of the group or a maximum scroll amount
      Overrides:
      postBake in class LayoutGroup
      Parameters:
      widgets - The list of widgets that this group was baked with and are layout controlled

    • applyLayout

      protected void applyLayout(List<net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.ClickableWidget> widgets)
      Description copied from class: LayoutGroup
      Apply this layout to a list of widgets. This function should be applied assuming (0, 0) is the top-left corner of the display area
      Specified by:
      applyLayout in class LayoutGroup
      Parameters:
      widgets - The list of widgets to apply the layout to
